pages.text: Gemmactena is an ancient comb jelly from the Cambrian period. It lived in a manner similar to modern comb jellies. They are predators, with their diet likely consisting of microscopic organisms.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
